document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">largest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Woman's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Heart </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">knew </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">do </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">yet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">largest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Woman's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Heart </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">hold </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Arrow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">instructed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">tenderer, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">turn </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: For largest woman's heart I knew
